channel.title: Forty-Two on Tim Rekelj
channel.description: Recent content in Forty-Two on Tim Rekelj

item.title: me
item.description: Hi there! My name is Tim Rekelj and I’m a 2nd grade computer science student at University of Ljubljana, Faculty of Computer and Information Science. I’ve always been fascinated by the potential of technology to solve complex problems and improve people’s lives. Throughout my studies, I’ve gained a solid foundation in programming languages and technologies such as Python, Java, Javascript/Typescript, C, Vue, Docker, Vagrant, Ansible, as well as an understanding of computer systems, algorithms and data structures.
